gnat.filter.nei
Class AbbreviationFilter

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.nei.AbbreviationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class AbbreviationFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

Tries to find long forms for short forms of gene names in a text. It then filters a gene name based on its long form, i.e., keeps it when the long form is annotated too or at least contains some predefined keywords.

Author:
Joerg

static java.lang.String findBestLongForm(java.lang.String shortForm, java.lang.String longForm)
          Algorithm from Schwartz and Hearst: Method findBestLongForm takes as input a short-form and a long-form candidate (a list of words) and returns the best long-form that matches the short-form, or null if no match is found.
static java.lang.String findBestLongForm(java.lang.String shortForm, java.lang.String text, int shortFormOpenBracketIndex)

Method Detail

filter

public void filter(Context context,
                   TextRepository textRepository,
                   GeneRepository geneRepository)
Description copied from interface: Filter
The minimum filtering method that has to be implemented. A Run will call this method for each filter in sequence.
Each filter can read and potentially change context, textRepository, and geneRepository in this method.

Specified by:
filter in interface Filter

public static java.lang.String findBestLongForm(java.lang.String shortForm,
                                                java.lang.String text,
                                                int shortFormOpenBracketIndex)
Returns the best long form, or null if no long form was found.

extractLongFormCandidates

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractLongFormCandidates(java.lang.String shortForm,
                                                                         java.lang.String text,
                                                                         int shortFormOpenBracketIndex,
                                                                         int maxPrecedingTokens)
Starts at the opening bracket and collects all preceding tokens.

findBestLongForm

public static java.lang.String findBestLongForm(java.lang.String shortForm,
                                                java.lang.String longForm)
Algorithm from Schwartz and Hearst: Method findBestLongForm takes as input a short-form and a long-form candidate (a list of words) and returns the best long-form that matches the short-form, or null if no match is found.

isAbbreviation

public static boolean isAbbreviation(java.lang.String shortForm,
                                     java.lang.String longForm)
Returns true if short form is an abbreviation for the long form.
